doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes material for artists, including, among others, Barbara Takenaga, Al Taylor, Paul Taylor, Joyce Tenneson, Wayne Thiebaud, Hank Willis Thomas, Mildred Thompson, Lin Tianmiao, Louis Comfort Tiffany, Mark Tobey, George Tooker, John Torreano, James Turrell, and Richard Tuttle. Also includes a MOMA brochure on its 1988 exhibition, "Projects: Rosemarie Trockel" with a short biography of the artist. Includes a 1994 MOMA brochure on its exhibition, "Cy Twombly: A Retrospective"; a 2001 National Gallery of Art brochure on its exhibition, "Cy Twombly: The Sculpture" and a 2018 Gagrosian booklet on its exhibition, "Cy Twombly: In Beauty it is finished".
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> T (Set 2)
